item.title: Python â€“ Building a Cisco Type 7 Decrypt Tool
item.description: I wrote a small python script that can decrypt cisco type 7 passwords. Cisco7Decrypt on Github You can decrypt password directly through the CLI: 1 2 â†’ python cisco7decrypt.py 12090404011C03162E password If you want the command accessible from anywhere, just link it to a folder that’s included in your Path. In this example ‘~/bin’ 1 ln-sn`pwd`/cisco7decrypt.py~/bin/cisco7decrypt

item.title: Cisco ACS â€“ Default User and Password for the GUI
item.description: Just for documentation reason, and for everyone out there that is looking for this information ðŸ™‚ Default ACS User/Password for the GUI. 1 2 Username: ACSAdmin Password: default After that, you get promoted for a new password.
